segments.text: What are you doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing much . I ’ m going to the cinema on Friday night but that ’ s all I have planned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you ’ re free on Saturday night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to have dinner with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that would be lovely . Shall we say seven o ’ clock ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perfect . I ’ ll pick you up then .
segments.speaker: S1
